text: Breezy is a 1973 American romantic drama movie directed by Clint Eastwood and is the first movie he didn't star in and starring William Holden, Kay Lenz, Roger C. Carmel, Marj Dusay, Joan Hotchkis, Lynn Borden, Shelley Morrison. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1973 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Breezy
